titleStmt.title: Loues triumph through Callipolis Performed in a masque at court 1630. By his Maiestie with the lords, and gentlemen assisting. The inuentors. Ben. Ionson. Inigo Iones.
titleStmt.author: Jonson, Ben, 1573?-1637.
Jones, Inigo, 1573-1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] N[orton] for Thomas Walkley, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Eagle and Child in Brittains-burse,

notesStmt.note: The year date is given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Eagle
